it.polimi.se2018.networking.client

Class TcpNetworkHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.networking.client.TcpNetworkHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerNetInterface, java.lang.Runnable

    public class TcpNetworkHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerNetInterface, java.lang.Runnable
    This class represents the server on client side. It is the access point to the server on client's side: it implements ServerNetInterface. It is associated to a client when creating it. It implements Runnable because the client needs to start a new thread of execution when launching TcpNetworkHandler because the interaction with the socket's stream (that are present here) are blocking methods.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TcpNetworkHandler

        public TcpNetworkHandler(java.lang.String address,
                         int port)
        The constructor of the class. It bounds this handler to the client specified and creates the client socket connecting to the server socket at the address and port specified.
        Parameters:
        address - The IP address where to find the server socket.
        port - The port where to find the server socket.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Right after the creation of the handler it is run and puts himself on hold of messages from the server through the socket connection until the connection is closed. When a message is received the handler invoke the notify method on the ClientImplementation associated to it that will notify the View. The messages that have to be notified are show messages or model update messages.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • send

        public void send(Message message)
        This method send through the connection the messages from this client to the server (that will be ViewMessage). It is invoked from the update of the ClientImplementation that is Observer of the View and so is notified when the View is updated.
        Specified by:
        send in interface ServerNetInterface
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send.

      • addClient

        public void addClient(ClientNetInterface client)
        The method to add a client to the server.
        Specified by:
        addClient in interface ServerNetInterface
        Parameters:
        client - the client to add.

      • removeClient

        public void removeClient(ClientNetInterface client)
        The method to remove a client from the server.
        Specified by:
        removeClient in interface ServerNetInterface
        Parameters:
        client - the client to remove.
